name: FatalMind Demo (Android)
description:
Fatal Mind V0.0.5Bug

Fatal Mind is a game about switching between two dimensions and two players. Kinda like Yin Yang. You need to switch between dimensions to get to the end. Both players need to reach the end so you can complete the levels. Fatal Mind is a solo puzzle game. 

Update Log:

V0.0.5Bug

-Some bugs got fixed.

-Added UI and level selector.

-Different levels.

Bugs:

-None

Upcoming plans:

-100 levels.

-Level editor;

-Skins

-Settings

Credits to:

This game was made in one week. It is still a prototype. So the game will improve.
